name: Tower Defense (José Martins)
description:
Survive through each enemy wave in order to win

Can you survive to Wave 12 and win your hard-earned victory, or will you fail to protect the tower?

Features
  • Four types of enemies.
  • Three different turrets to use.
  • Point and click gameplay.
  • Calming forest ambience.
Controls
  • Left Mouse Button to select and place turrets.
  • Right Mouse Button to cancel placement of a turret.
  • M or ESC to pause the game.
Credits Turret Models
